author: rwesten
msg: STANBOL-235: Added utility for analyzing text. Basically this will move OpenNLP specific functionality currently directly implemented within the TaxonomyLinkingEngine to this bundle so that it can also be used by other components.
While functional I would not suggest to use this right now, because the interface might change dramatically in the near future.
